message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product but $110 feels a bit high for me. Would you consider a lower price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $100?
